import{ALLOWED_PRICE_IMPACT_HIGH,PRICE_IMPACT_WITHOUT_FEE_CONFIRM_MIN}from'../../constants';/**
 * Given the price impact, get user confirmation.
 *
 * @param priceImpactWithoutFee price impact of the trade without the fee.
 */export default function confirmPriceImpactWithoutFee(priceImpactWithoutFee){if(!priceImpactWithoutFee.lessThan(PRICE_IMPACT_WITHOUT_FEE_CONFIRM_MIN)){return window.prompt("This swap has a price impact of at least ".concat(PRICE_IMPACT_WITHOUT_FEE_CONFIRM_MIN.toFixed(0),"%. Please type the word \"confirm\" to continue with this swap."))==='confirm';}else if(!priceImpactWithoutFee.lessThan(ALLOWED_PRICE_IMPACT_HIGH)){return window.confirm("This swap has a price impact of at least ".concat(ALLOWED_PRICE_IMPACT_HIGH.toFixed(0),"%. Please confirm that you would like to continue with this swap."));}return true;}
